backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence describing required category banner image updates and static asset additions.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files, describing structure and behavior.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles with OKLCH color tokens, light/dark theme variables, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts, favicon, and root element with enforced light background.
frontend/postcss.config.cjs: PostCSS config enabling Tailwind and Autoprefixer plugins.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React SPA rendering header, hero, menu categories, and map preview with section switching logic.
frontend/src/components/LocationMapPrevi: Map component embedding Google Maps with loading state and fallback card if embedding fails.
frontend/src/components/MenuCategoryGrid: Renders a category banner image, title, and responsive grid of menu item cards.
frontend/src/components/MenuItemCard.tsx: Displays menu item details with WhatsApp ordering and optional variant selection dialog.
frontend/src/components/RevealableSectio: Renders a Section only when isRevealed is true, passing background and classes through.
frontend/src/components/SafeImage.tsx: Displays an image that swaps to a fallback on load error and resets when src changes.
frontend/src/components/Section.tsx: Wraps children in a styled section with variant-based background classes.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Fixed header with logo and navigation buttons that trigger section navigation.
frontend/src/content/business.ts: Stores business metadata, menu helpers, images, hours, contact info, and WhatsApp config.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context with login, logout, status, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for backend-related React Query hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useRevealableSections: Manages which section is active and handles reveal logic with scroll adjustment.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles, theme variables, animations, and utility classes for the site.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Builds WhatsApp order links and derives variant pricing options for menu items.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom colors, fonts, shadows, and animations with typography, container query, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata defining site requirements, branding changes, menu rules, image needs, known issues, and existing features.
